short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Add your own icons to extension panel for fast access!
short.ru: Добавьте вашу закладку на панель расширений для более быстрого доступа!

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
"Top Marks" - it's set of extensions for make your panel extension really useful. 

"Top Marks - Purple" improves your panel extension, by adding your own full customizing links for fast and easy using!
How to use?
- One click for open link
- DoubleClick for open edit panel
